- Sistemi v
5) 	D = 0100'0100
	235 = 1110'1011

****'*****	| 1110'1011	| 111
0100'0100	| 1110'1011	| 110

7)	45 = 0010'1101 
	179 = 1011'0011
	7 = 0000'0111
	5 = 0000'0101
	12 = 0000'1100
	2 = 0000'0010
	
****'*****	| 0010'1101	| 110
0000'0111	| 0010'1101	| 110
0000'0111	| 1011'0011	| 110
0000'0101	| 0010'1101	| 110
0000'1100	| 0000'0010 | 101

8)	45 = 0010'1101 
	179 = 1011'0011
	7 = 0000'0111
	5 = 0000'0101
	2 = 0000'0010
	
****'****	| 0010'1101	| 111
0000'0111	| 0010'1101	| 111
0000'0111	| 1011'0011	| 111
0000'0101	| 0010'1101	| 111
0000'0010	| 0000'0111 | 000	

11) 20 = 0001'0100
	3 = 0000'0011
	23 = 0001'0111 
	56 = 0011'1000 
	
0001'0100 	| ****'**** | *10
0000'0011 	| ****'**** | *10
0001'0111 	| 0011'1000 | 001	

12)	12 = 0000'1100
	7 = 0000'0111
	84 = 0101'0100 
	
0000'1100	| ****'**** | *10
0000'0111 	| ****'**** | *10
0101'0100  	| 0000'1100 | 001	

13)	21 = 0001'0101
	4 = 0000'0100
	17 = 0001'0001
	37 = 0010'0101

0001'0101	| ****'**** | *10
0000'0100	| ****'**** | *10
0001'0001  	| 0010'0101 | 001
